There
               
              is
               
              more
               
              in
               
              it
              .
              —
              Cousin
               
              Ganymede
              .

speaker: OLIVER
text: Look, he recovers.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: I would I were at home.

speaker: CELIA
text: We’ll lead you thither.—I pray you,

speaker: CELIA
text: will you take him by the arm?

speaker: OLIVER
text: Be of good cheer,

speaker: OLIVER
text: youth. You a man? You lack a man’s heart.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: I do so, I confess it. Ah,

speaker: ROSALIND
text: sirrah, a body would think this was well-counterfeited.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: I pray you tell your brother how well I

speaker: ROSALIND
text: counterfeited. Heigh-ho.

speaker: OLIVER
text: This was not counterfeit. There is too great

speaker: OLIVER
text: testimony in your complexion that it was a passion

speaker: OLIVER
text: of earnest.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: Counterfeit, I assure you.

speaker: OLIVER
text: Well then, take a good heart, and counterfeit to

speaker: OLIVER
text: be a man.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: So I do; but, i’ faith, I should

speaker: ROSALIND
text: have been a woman by right.

speaker: CELIA
text: Come, you look paler and paler. Pray

speaker: CELIA
text: you draw homewards.—Good sir, go with us.

speaker: OLIVER
text:
That
               
              will
               
              I
              ,
               
              for
               
              I
               
              must
               
              bear
               
              answer
               
              back

speaker: OLIVER
text:
How
               
              you
               
              excuse
               
              my
               
              brother
              ,
               
              Rosalind
              .

speaker: ROSALIND
text: I shall devise something.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: But I pray you commend my counterfeiting to him.

speaker: ROSALIND
text: Will you go?
